title: The Equestranauts
description: Peggy-sis, Chariot, Headhorn, and Minnie protect Horse Valley Farm from the evil Xandar. The Equestranauts have a bond of friendship greater than any force in the universe.
quote: I love a good picnic after completing a picnic.
altHero: three colorful horses in armor and one tiny horse have a picnic under a rainbow
alt1: four colorful horses graze in a field outside a barn
alt2: Xander’s head, an evil sorcerer type, appears in the sky as dark clouds form
alt3: the horses run toward the barn
alt4: Peggy-sis (the winged horse) suiting up in her armor
